personal.name: Bruce Blake
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.currentFocus: Developing impactful AI-driven solutions, contributing to large-scale software platforms at Google, and deepening expertise in full-stack engineering.

summary.brief: Computer Engineering student at Virginia Tech with a 3.85 GPA, incoming Google intern, and proven track record in developing AI-driven solutions, full-stack applications, and competitive engineering achievements.
summary.detailed: I am a results-oriented Software Engineer passionate about building impactful technology solutions. My experience includes internships at Google where I developed ML-powered features for company-wide systems, freelance work building revenue-generating AI voice ordering systems, and winning hackathons. I excel in full-stack development with expertise in Java, Python, TypeScript, and modern frameworks like React, Angular, and FastAPI.
summary.uniqueValue: My unique value lies in combining strong academic performance (3.85 GPA), practical industry experience at Google, and entrepreneurial success in developing revenue-generating AI solutions. I've demonstrated the ability to deliver complex systems serving thousands of users while maintaining high technical standards.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering

experience.title: Freelance Software Engineer
experience.description: Architected and developed a full-stack AI-driven voice ordering system serving 600+ users and generating $15,000+ in revenue
responsibilities: Architected and developed a full-stack AI-driven voice ordering system, integrating OpenAI's Realtime API for NLP and Twilio ConversationRelay for real-time voice processing
Built a multi-agent orchestration system using a FSM to manage complex conversational flows using OpenAI Agents SDK
Designed and implemented FastAPI backend services utilizing PostgreSQL for persistent storage and Redis for caching
Utilized Celery for asynchronous background task processing, such as order processing and notifications
achievements: Served 600+ users and generated $15,000+ in revenue
Successfully launched scalable system handling concurrent calls

experience.title: STEP Intern
experience.description: Created an ML-powered recommendation feature for Buganizer, reducing issue management overhead for 2.5 million monthly active users
responsibilities: Created an ML-powered recommendation feature for Buganizer, for issue similarity based on titles and existing hotlist data
Reduced issue management on internal issue tracking system supporting workflows for over 2.5 million monthly active users
Developed the system using Java with Apps Framework, and TypeScript with Angular, including a queue messenger
Authored design & implementation documentation, and successfully launched the feature internally within 12 weeks
